Entries.Penny_spouse: Maru's trying to convince me to eat a devilled egg. I'm just not sure I can stomach it...
Entries.Linus: No one really talks to me... I just come for the devilled eggs.
Entries.Emily: I've been up since dawn colouring eggs... it's always my favourite part of the season.$h
Entries.Gus: I hope everyone's enjoying the food... I've been cooking for days to get everything ready.#$b#Fried eggs, boiled eggs, poached eggs, devilled eggs, scrambled eggs, chocolate eggs... you name it!$h
Entries.Abigail_y2: $y 'Do you think I'm too old to do the egg hunt?_Yes_Hmmph... you sound like my mum!$a_No_Yeah, I guess so. If I'm still having fun, why stop?'
